channel.title: Error problem rawr!
channel.description: ok whenever i seel and item i lose connection and reconnect again by itself and the item still does sell and i get the money but it shouldnt disconnect tho and i get this error in my compiler when it happens[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 101 at client.addShopItem(client.java:28273) at client.sellItem(client.java:28196) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20355) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15898) at client.packetSending(client.java:15867) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:48)[/code]how do i fix it this?

item.description:
@Spoonkitty wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:7, topic:178478”]You didn’t post what I needed.[/quote]sorry dude i didnt read what u wanted me to do properly
here it is…

public boolean addShopItem(int itemID, int amount) { boolean Added = false; if (amount <= 0) { return false; } if (Item.itemIsNote[itemID] == true) { itemID = GetUnnotedItem(itemID); } for (int i = 0; i < server.shopHandler.ShopItems.length; i++) { if ((server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][i] - 1) == itemID) { server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][i] += amount; Added = true; } } if (Added == false) { for (int i = 0; i < server.shopHandler.ShopItems.length; i++) { if (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][i] == 0) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][i] = (itemID + 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][i] = amount; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][i] = 0; break; } } } return true; }and this is the error for the addShopItem

			itemID = GetUnnotedItem(itemID);
